result.name: lost-stolen-recovered-mobiles-laptops-removable-media-home-office
result.notes:
These tables present annual figures for lost, stolen and recovered blackberries, mobile phones, laptops and removable media at the Home Office, from 2005 onwards.

.

odi-certificate.title: Lost, stolen and recovered mobiles, laptops and removable media

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: Lost, stolen and recovered mobiles, laptops and removable media
